code: import{ACTIONS}from"./../../actions";import{produce}from"imer";var initState={lastChange:null,preGain:0,postGain:0,threshold:0,ration:1,attack:.003,ralease:.25};var nextState=function nextState(state,variable,value){return produce(state,function(draftState){draftState.lastChange={signature:"#"+variable,value:value};draftState[variable]=value;});};export default function mixerReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ACTIONS.SET_PRE_GAIN:{return nextState(state,"preGain",action.value);}case ACTIONS.SET_POST_GAIN:{return nextState(state,"postGain",action.value);}case ACTIONS.SET_THRESHOLD:{return nextState(state,"threshold",action.value);}case ACTIONS.SET_RATIO:{return nextState(state,"ratio",action.value);}case ACTIONS.SET_ATTACK:{return nextState(state,"attack",action.value);}case ACTIONS.SET_RELEASE:{return nextState(state,"release",action.value);}default:return state;}}
